synonyms.synonym: PH, SEC7 and coiled-coil domain-containing protein 4

protein.general_function: Involved in ARF guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Promotes guanine-nucleotide exchange on ARF1 and ARF5. Promotes the activation of ARF through replacement of GDP with GTP

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of arf protein signal transduction

reference.reference_text: Ogasawara M, Kim SC, Adamik R, Togawa A, Ferrans VJ, Takeda K, Kirby M, Moss J, Vaughan M: Similarities in function and gene structure of cytohesin-4 and cytohesin-1, guanine nucleotide-exchange proteins for ADP-ribosylation factors. J Biol Chem. 2000 Feb 4;275(5):3221-30.
